targets.expr: (sum by (peer_service) (rate(${namespace}_calls_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service!="", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) or sum by (peer_service) (rate(${namespace}_calls_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service!=""}[$__rate_interval])) * 0) / sum by (peer_service) (rate(${namespace}_calls_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

(sum by (service_name) (rate(${namespace}_calls_total{peer_service="${service}", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) or sum by (service_name) (rate(${namespace}_calls_total{peer_service="${service}"}[$__rate_interval])) * 0) / sum by (service_name) (rate(${namespace}_calls_total{peer_service="${service}"}[$__rate_interval]))
